name: Pyonvif
tagline: Class and tester tool for interacting with cameras following ONVIF standard
body:
### pyonvif
Pyonvif provides a class to interact with OnVif cameras. It contains the SOAP message encoding for the basic functions that are commonly needed. You need python WS-Discovery (https://github.com/hlamer/python-ws-discovery) for this to work.

Pyonviftester is an application for testing the pyonvif class and its basic functionalities. It can also start ffplay that shows rtsp stream coming from camera. Uses beautifulsoup to print soap responses.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
